forecastday.title: Monday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 16C. Winds SSE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Considerable cloudiness with occasional rain showers. High 62F. Winds SSE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Monday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady light rain this evening. Showers with perhaps a rumble of thunder developing overnight. Low 13C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. Thunder possible. Low 56F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High 16C. Winds SSW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning followed by occasional showers in the afternoon. High near 60F. Winds SSW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Low around 10C. Winds SSW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thunderstorms likely. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 13C. Winds WNW at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Thunderstorms in the morning, then partly cloudy late. High 57F. Winds WNW at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies. Low 8C. Winds NW at 25 to 40 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. Low 47F. Winds NW at 15 to 25 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Sunny along with a few clouds. High 14C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally sunny despite a few afternoon clouds. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy skies early will give way to cloudy skies and rain later during the night. Low around 10C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional rain after midnight. Low near 50F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. High 13C. Winds SSE at 25 to 40 km/h. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with periods of rain. High 57F. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Friday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 9C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 90%.
forecastday.fcttext: A steady rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 49F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly sunny skies. High 14C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: A few clouds from time to time. High 59F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Saturday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: A few clouds. Low 8C. Winds WNW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Generally fair. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Mostly cloudy early with showers developing later in the day. High 13C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Increasing clouds with showers arriving sometime in the afternoon. High 57F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the evening, then partly cloudy overnight. Low 8C. Winds W at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers early with overcast skies late. Low 46F. Winds W at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Intervals of clouds and sunshine. High 61F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 49F. Winds W at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High 62F. Winds WNW at 10 to 20 mph.
